summary: A famous DJ in the Ibiza club scene finds the alcohol and drug-fueled party that is his life threatened by the progressive loss of his hearing.
cast: Paul Kaye|Beatriz Batarda|Kate Magowan|Mike Wilmot|Neil Maskell|Monica Maja|Pete Tong|Ron Lloy Hugh Elliston|Dan Antopolski|Tim Plester|Paul Spence|David Lawrence|Steve Oram|Geffen Strummer Kaye|Borja Galban-Fear|S.C. Lim|Sterling Williams|Simon J. Willis|Gideon Gold|Gordon Skilling|Carl Cox|Paul Van Dyk|Charlie Chester|Sarah Main|Tiësto|Danny Whittle|Barry Ashworth|Lol Hammond|Victoria Bianco|Raquel Garcia|Jes Kronberg Christensen|Torrente Arcotongelo|Christian Piera Fernández|Freddie Lee Thompson|Rudy Siano|Janine Schmidt|Angeles 'La Chocolata' Navarro|Marcial Rodríguez Fernandéz|Ismael Rodríguez Fernández|Francisco Romero García|Pedrito Garcia
title: La leyenda del DJ Frankie Wilde
